name: UIFontDescriptor
desc: A collection of attributes that describes a font.

items.name: class func preferredFontDescriptor(withTextStyle: UIFont.TextStyle) -> UIFontDescriptor
items.desc: Returns a font descriptor that contains the specified text style and the user's selected content size category.

items.name: class func preferredFontDescriptor(withTextStyle: UIFont.TextStyle, compatibleWith: UITraitCollection?) -> UIFontDescriptor
items.desc: Returns a font descriptor that contains the text style and the content size category that the provided trait collection specifies.

items.name: init(name: String, matrix: CGAffineTransform)
items.desc: Returns a font descriptor with the specified values for the name and matrix dictionary attributes.

items.name: init(name: String, size: CGFloat)
items.desc: Returns a font descriptor with the specified values for the name and size dictionary attributes.

items.name: func addingAttributes([UIFontDescriptor.AttributeName : Any]) -> UIFontDescriptor
items.desc: Returns a new font descriptor that is the same as the existing descriptor, but with the specified attributes taking precedence over the existing ones.

items.name: func withDesign(UIFontDescriptor.SystemDesign) -> UIFontDescriptor?
items.desc: Returns a new font descriptor that is the same as the existing descriptor, but with the specified design.

items.name: func withFamily(String) -> UIFontDescriptor
items.desc: Returns a new font descriptor whose attributes are the same as the existing font descriptor, but from the specified family.

items.name: func withFace(String) -> UIFontDescriptor
items.desc: Returns a new font descriptor that is the same as the existing font descriptor, but with the specified face.

items.name: func withMatrix(CGAffineTransform) -> UIFontDescriptor
items.desc: Returns a new font descriptor that is the same as the existing font descriptor, but with the specified matrix.

items.name: func withSize(CGFloat) -> UIFontDescriptor
items.desc: Returns a new font descriptor that is the same as the existing font descriptor, but with the specified point size.

items.name: func withSymbolicTraits(UIFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits) -> UIFontDescriptor?
items.desc: Returns a new font descriptor that is the same as the existing font descriptor, but with the specified symbolic traits.

items.name: init(fontAttributes: [UIFontDescriptor.AttributeName : Any])
items.desc: Creates a font descriptor with the specified attributes.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a font descriptor.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a font descriptor from data in an unarchiver.

items.name: func matchingFontDescriptors(withMandatoryKeys: Set<UIFontDescriptor.AttributeName>?) -> [UIFontDescriptor]
items.desc: Returns all the fonts available in the system with specified attributes that match those of the font.

items.name: var fontAttributes: [UIFontDescriptor.AttributeName : Any]
items.desc: The font descriptor's dictionary of attributes.

items.name: var matrix: CGAffineTransform
items.desc: The current transform matrix of the font descriptor.

items.name: func object(forKey: UIFontDescriptor.AttributeName) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the font attribute that the corresponding key specifies.

items.name: var pointSize: CGFloat
items.desc: The point size of the font descriptor.

items.name: var postscriptName: String
items.desc: The PostScript name of the font descriptor.

items.name: var symbolicTraits: UIFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: The traits of the font descriptor.

items.name: struct UIFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: Constants that describe the stylistic aspects of a font.

items.name: struct UIFont.TextStyle
items.desc: Constants that describe the preferred styles for fonts.

items.name: struct UIFontDescriptor.SystemDesign
items.desc: Constants that describe the system-defined typeface designs.

items.name: struct UIFontDescriptor.SymbolicTraits
items.desc: Constants that describe the stylistic aspects of a font.

items.name: typealias UIFontDescriptor.Class
items.desc: Constants that classify certain stylistic qualities of the font.

items.name: struct UIFontDescriptor.AttributeName
items.desc: Constants that describe font attributes.

items.name: struct UIFontDescriptor.FeatureKey
items.desc: Keys for retrieving feature settings.

items.name: struct UIFontDescriptor.TraitKey
items.desc: Keys for retrieving the font descriptor's trait information.

items.name: struct UIFont.Weight
items.desc: Constants that represent standard typeface styles.
